name: haptic
description: Straightforward reactive web rendering in TSX
author: Gen Hames

scripts.bundlesize: echo $(esbuild --bundle src/index.ts --format=esm --minify --define:STATE_OFF=0 --define:STATE_ON=1 --define:STATE_RUNNING=2 --define:STATE_PAUSED=3 --define:STATE_STALE=4 | gzip -9 | wc -c) min+gzip bytes
